item.title: Report E-2025030441
item.description:
Report E-2025030441

Identified by scraper @ 2025-04-15T00:53:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-27
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Hepaco personnel arrived onsite and observed an estimated 3 gallons of material spilled from one (1) 330-gallon plastic IBC tote. The material released impacted the trailer and the concrete dock floor. Before Hepaco arrived, absorbents were placed around the tote. After a safety briefing, Hepaco began the tote transfer. When the tote transfer was complete, the damaged tote and impacted absorbents were placed into two (2) 55-gallon metal drums. The generated waste was staged onsite and will remain onsite for the Dayton Freight team to coordinate disposal. The Dayton Freight POC approved all work before Hepaco departed.
